resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156808</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156808</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3364</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Guide to the Israel 60 Educational Kit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Führen Sie zum Israel 60 pädagogischen 
Installationssatz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guidez au kit éducatif de l'Israel 60</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guie ao jogo educacional de Israel 60</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guidi al kit educativo dell'Israele 60</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγός για το Ισραήλ 60 εκπαιδευτική εξάρτηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dirija al kit educativo de Israel 60</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This Educational Guide is a kit designed to be used in both family and educational settings,
whether at a celebration gathering, for Yom Ha'atzmaut (Independence Day ), or as a basis for creative activities and discussions about Israel in
our own lives.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Independence day</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">celbrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese pädagogische Anleitung ist ein 
Installationssatz, der konzipiert ist, in der Familie und in den 
pädagogischen Einstellungen verwendet zu werden, ob an einer 
Feierversammlung, für Yom Ha'atzmaut (Unabhängigkeit-Tag) oder als 
Grundlage für kreative Aktivitäten und Diskussionen über Israel 
inour Selbst lebt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce guide éducatif est un kit conçu pour être 
utilisé dans la famille et les configurations éducatives, si à une 
réunion de célébration, pour Yom Ha'atzmaut (jour d'indépendance),
ou comme base pour des activités créatrices et des discussions au 
sujet d'inour de l'Israel propre vit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta guia educacional é um jogo projetado ser 
usado  na família e em ajustes educacionais, se em um recolhimento do
celebration, para Yom Ha'atzmaut (dia de independência), ou como uma 
base para atividades creativas e discussões sobre o inour de Israel 
própria vive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa guida educativa è un kit destinato per 
essere usato sia in famiglia che nelle regolazioni educative, se ad 
una riunione di celebrazione, per Yom Ha'atzmaut (giorno di 
indipendenza), o come una base per le attività creative e discussioni
circa il inour dell'Israele propria vive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο εκπαιδευτικός οδηγός είναι μια εξάρτηση με 
σκοπό να χρησιμοποιηθεί και στην οικογένεια και στις εκπαιδευτικές
τιμές των παραμέτρων, είτε σε έναν εορτασμό που συλλέγει, για 
Yom Ha'atzmaut (ημέρα ανεξαρτησίας), είτε ως βάση για τις 
δημιουργικές δραστηριότητες και τις συζητήσεις για τις ζωές του 
Ισραήλ inour.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta guía educativa es un kit diseñado para ser
utilizado en familia y configuraciones educativas, si en una reunión 
de la celebración, para Yom Ha'atzmaut (día de independencia), o 
como una base para las actividades creativas y discusiones sobre el 
inour de Israel la propia vive.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unabhängigkeittag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">celbrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation anglaise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jour d'indépendance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">celbrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dia de independência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">celbrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Israele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giorno di indipendenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">celbrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισραήλ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ημέρα ανεξαρτησίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">celbrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Educación inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Día de independencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">celbrations</string>
          </keyword>
